section-1.title: Print photos with just a text message
section-1.text: No downloading apps. No driving to the store. Just a text messages to get high quality photos.

section-2.title: High quality photos at a low price

blobs.title: Text Message Ordering
blobs.text: Order your photos the same way you chat with your friends. No complicated apps or trips to Wallgreens.

blobs.title: Highest Quality Prints
blobs.text: We use the most advanced wet-lab equipment in the world with silver halide photo prints on Fujifilm paper to deliver the best print quality possible.

blobs.title: Lowest Prices Guarenteed
blobs.text: We partner with the most efficient labs around the world so you save money on printing and shipping.

blobs.title: Leak testing
blobs.subtitle: World-class leak detection systems and equipment from Cincinnati Test Systems

blobs.title: plastic welding
blobs.subtitle: Industry leading plastic assembly with Dukane

blobs.title: automation
blobs.subtitle: Single production cells and complete manufacturing systems

blobs.title: metal stampings
blobs.subtitle: Optimal sourcing for your short run metal forming needs

blobs.title: membrane switches
blobs.subtitle: Seamless membrane switch, nameplate, and graphic overlays from Nelson Miller

blobs.title: chemical etching
blobs.subtitle: Premium photo-chemical capabilities provided by Nelson Miller

section-5.title: Contact Us
section-5.subtitle: Located in the San Francisco Bay Area, Avocet provides companies in Northern California and Nevada the engineering solutions they need from suppliers around the world.

contacts.text: Avocet Sales & Marketing, Inc., 737 2nd Street, Suite 305, Oakland, California 94607

main.title: Panda Print
main.subtitle: The fastest and easiest way to print your favorite photos. Just text us your pictures and we'll handle everything else.

section-4.title: Find out what we can do for you!
